description.plain:
“ODESZA” is an American electronic music duo from Seattle consisting of Harrison Mills and Clayton Knight. The group was formed in 2012 shortly before Mills and Knight graduated from Western Washington University.

Their debut album, Summer’s Gone, was released in 2012 to much acclaim in the underground electronic music community. ODESZA followed Summer’s Gone with their first EP, My Friends Never Die, in 2013 and their second studio album, In Return, in 2014. The duo released the deluxe edition of In Return on September 18, 2015 via Counter Records, an extended version of the original album plus three live recordings all featuring a horn section, instrumentals, and a new track “Light” (featuring Little Dragon). On December 7, 2015, ODESZA’s “Say My Name” (RAC mix) was nominated for Best Remixed Recording, Non-Classical at the 58th Annual Grammy Awards. The duo’s third studio album, A Moment Apart was released on September 8, 2017. On November 28, 2017, A Moment Apart was nominated for Best Dance/Electronic Album at the 60th Annual Grammy Awards; their single “Line of Sight” featuring WYNNE & Mansionair was nominated for Best Dance Recording.

In addition to the Grammy nomination, A Moment Apart reached #3 on the Billboard Top 200 and #1 on the Top Electronic/Dance Albums Chart.

body.plain:
“ODESZA” is an American electronic music duo from Seattle consisting of Harrison Mills and Clayton Knight. The group was formed in 2012 shortly before Mills and Knight graduated from Western Washington University.

Their debut album, Summer’s Gone, was released in 2012 to much acclaim in the underground electronic music community. ODESZA followed Summer’s Gone with their first EP, My Friends Never Die, in 2013 and their second studio album, In Return, in 2014. The duo released the deluxe edition of In Return on September 18, 2015 via Counter Records, an extended version of the original album plus three live recordings all featuring a horn section, instrumentals, and a new track “Light” (featuring Little Dragon). On December 7, 2015, ODESZA’s “Say My Name” (RAC mix) was nominated for Best Remixed Recording, Non-Classical at the 58th Annual Grammy Awards. The duo’s third studio album, A Moment Apart was released on September 8, 2017. On November 28, 2017, A Moment Apart was nominated for Best Dance/Electronic Album at the 60th Annual Grammy Awards; their single “Line of Sight” featuring WYNNE & Mansionair was nominated for Best Dance Recording.

In addition to the Grammy nomination, A Moment Apart reached #3 on the Billboard Top 200 and #1 on the Top Electronic/Dance Albums Chart.

songs.full_title: Say My Name by ODESZA (Ft. Zyra)
songs.title: Say My Name

description.plain: A single off Odesza’s second album. Vocals are provided by English songwriter Alexandra Cheatle, going by the moniker Zyra, who also co-wrote the track.

songs.full_title: It's Only by ODESZA (Ft. Zyra)
songs.title: It’s Only

description.plain: One of the most popular songs from ODESZA’s In Return, “It’s Only” is the ninth track from the album, with graceful and moving lyrics from Zyra.

songs.embed_content: Read “It's Only” by ODESZA on Genius

songs.lyrics:
32 ContributorsIt’s Only Lyrics[Verse 1: Zyra]
I heard the news today that you're not mine to keep
Don't struggle too much now while I kill you in your sleep
What is lust if it's not being by yourself?
I won't be gentle to the body on the shelf

[Chorus: Zyra]
It's only water, it's only fire, it's only love
It's only slaughter, we're only liars, it's only blood
They're only thoughts that I'm having, thoughts safe within my head
You're only crying, you're only dying, you're only red
[Verse 2: Zyra]
I heard the news today that you weren't mine to save
I hope that you're comfortable in the quiet lasting grave ([?])
What is lust if it's not being by yourself?
I won't be gentle to the body on the shelf

[Chorus: Zyra]
It's only water, it's only fire, it's only love
It's only slaughter, we're only liars, it's only blood
They're only thoughts that I'm having, thoughts safe within my head
You're only crying, you're only dying, you're only dead

[Bridge: Zyra]
It's only water, it's only fire, it's only love
It's only water, it's only fire, it's only love
